utility.name: >userinfo (user)
utility.desc: Shows mentioned user's info, or yours if not specified

utility.name: >dm (mention) "message"
utility.desc: DMs a message to a user.

utility.name: >rps (choice)
utility.desc: Play "Rock Paper Scissors" with the bot. Choices include: ```r, p, s``` or ```rock, paper, scissors```.

utility.name: >setting (type) (true or false)
utility.desc: Changes your user settings, where type include - 'bankdm', 'passive'. Example: ">setting bankdm false"

utility.name: >reply (text),(reply) _Warning: No spaces after/before/in commas_
utility.desc: Makes the bot reply when you send a specific text.

utility.name: >dt
utility.desc: Shows the current date and time (AM/PM).

utility.name: >serverinfo
utility.desc: Shows the server's info on which command is run.

moderation.name: >nowarns (mention)
moderation.desc: Clear all warns for a user (Individual removal not supported yet).

moderation.name: >mute
moderation.desc: Mutes the mentioned user (Mute = Disable chat and VC).

moderation.name: >unmute
moderation.desc: Unmutes the mentioned user (Mute = Enable chat and VC).

moderation.name: >warn (mention) "cause"
moderation.desc: Warns a user. _Usage: Type >warn, then mention user, then put reason within quotation marks (") (no reason supported too). Put space between each argument. Multiple warns supported. Warns are isolated for each server._

moderation.name: >getwarns (mention)
moderation.desc: Gets all warns for a user.

economy.name: >glb
economy.desc: Compare and check richest users of our bot (Global)!

economy.name: >lb
economy.desc: Compare and check out richest users of your server!

economy.name: >buy (item codename)
economy.desc: Buy an item from the shop. Codename with command is available when you type 'shop', under the 'Command for buying' section.

economy.name: >shop
economy.desc: Shows a list of all items in the shop, and their details.

economy.name: >rob (mention)
economy.desc: Rob others and get money, the dark way.

economy.name: >use (item codename)
economy.desc: Use an item in your inventory. Codename with command is available when you type 'shop', under the 'Command for using' section

economy.name: >inv
economy.desc: Displays a list of all items in your inventory.
